# Parachute Instructors and Camerapersons RFP
## Description of Opportunity
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking qualified civilian Canopy Relative Work (CRW)/Freefall Parachute Instructors and Freefall/CRW Camerapersons to support the Canadian Armed Forces Parachute Team (CAFPT).

## Background
The CAFPT requires highly specialized instructors to train members of the CAFPT cadre into competent CRW instructors and to augment these instructors to support a 1:1 training ratio throughout its training camps. The team also requires contractors with experience in producing professional quality video and still photography of each training session for video debriefs and promotional products, as well as instruction on free-fall photography and filmography.

## Requirements
We are seeking qualified individuals to fulfill the following roles:

* Canopy Relative Work (CRW)/Freefall Parachute Instructors: Train members of the CAFPT cadre into competent CRW instructors.
* Freefall/CRW Camerapersons: Capture professional quality video and still photography of each training session for video debriefs and promotional products, as well as provide instruction on free-fall photography and filmography.

## Submissions
Bids must be submitted by December 16, 2022 at 14:00 HNE. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on the designated date and time. Bids submitted after 14:00 HNE will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Note
The Department of National Defence (DND) is a contracting authority of the Canadian government. This call for tenders is in compliance with the Canadian government's procurement policies.
